pages.text:
Boxes are used to package items inside when transporting with ants. There are 3 tiers of boxes.
All of them can hold different amounts of items and types of items. You can put items in and get items out of boxes with the $(l:antsportation:machines/boxer)Boxer$() and $(l:antsportation:machines/unboxer)Unboxer$() machine respectively.
pages.title: Boxes

pages.text:
Basic Boxes are the cheapest boxes and can store the least amount of items.
They can store $(bold)256 items in total, of max $(bold)16 different types.

Advanced Boxes are the middle tier boxes and are a lot bigger than Basic Boxes.
Advanced Boxes can store $(bold)2K items in total and up to $(bold)36 different types.

Epic Boxes are the highest tier of boxes. They are a lot more expensive but can also store a lot more items.
Epic Boxes can store up to $(bold)16.4K items in total and up to $(bold)64 different types!
